item.title: A localwiki for the Marquette, Michigan area
item.description: There's no better way to learn about your home town than by trying to start a wiki for it. In that regard, I'm happy to announce a new Localwiki installation for Marquette County, Michigan. The Localwiki crew has developed a new hosting platform for people who want to start a wiki for their area, but who don't have the resources or the time or the skills to launch their own server.
